topic: Topic: Changing from physics to computer science and enrollment
question: I am a student of B.Sc. Physics and have questions about enrolling in the Bachelor of Computer Science. Can I participate in the summer semester of 2025 if I receive sufficient grades in the courses IN0004 and IN0001? Do I also have to pay the tuition fee of 3000 euros?"
answer: In order to start studying the Bachelor's degree in Computer Science in the summer semester, you need at least 30 credits beforehand. The subjects IN0004 and IN0001 are not sufficient for this. Information on tuition fees can be found here: https://www.tum.de/studium/studienfinanzierung/studiengebuehren-fuer-studierende-aus-nicht-eu-laendern. If you have any questions, please contact the responsible office directly.
